title: Science Learning Strategy Design Utilizing Social Media

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and experience with mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Learners are job seekers highly interested in self-directed learning and acquiring practical digital literacy. They prefer content accessible within short timeframes via mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the functions of social media platforms and design three or more strategies for applying them to scientific topic learning.
Learners can identify three cognitive/social barriers encountered during social media-based learning and propose solutions.
In a mobile microlearning environment, learners can engage in collaborative learning by exchanging peer feedback five or more times via social media.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
